name: Compressed Poser Prop File
summary: Learn about .PPZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Uncompressed Poser prop files use the .PP2 extension.
NOTE: Poser was originally developed by Smith Micro, but was sold to Bondware in June 2019.

description: Compressed prop or object referenced by a model or animation created with Poser, a 3D human modeling program; may contain either geometry data or a reference to a .OBJ files that includes geometry information.
